attributes.description:
This example is a 2014 VW Polo hatch 1.2TSI highline DSG, the vehicle brings much and better comfort, build quality and feel. If you are love to be recognized as a premium hatch owner, you can go for it. The vehicle comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering wheel, central locking remote, black leather seats, fully functioning electric windows, panoramic sunroof, climate control, air conditioning, radio/CD/AUX input and plenty legroom for both driver and rear passengers. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
#10290
